Sentencas: We present here a new manufacturing procedure for the anode Ni-zirconia cermet.
Titulo: Directionally solidified calcia stabilised zirconia-nickel oxide plates in anode supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is based on the modification of the surface of a NiO-CaSZ (calcia stabilized zirconia) pellet of eutectic composition by surface laser melting and resolidification.
Titulo: Directionally solidified calcia stabilised zirconia-nickel oxide plates in anode supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A smooth, continuous and dense NiO-CaSZ layer is obtained on top of the ceramic pellet.
Titulo: Directionally solidified calcia stabilised zirconia-nickel oxide plates in anode supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Its depth can be varied from less than 200 mum to more than 570 mum, depending on the processing conditions.
Titulo: Directionally solidified calcia stabilised zirconia-nickel oxide plates in anode supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Its microstructure consists mainly of lamellar eutectic grains with interlamellar spacing ranging from 0.4 to 1.6 mum.
Titulo: Directionally solidified calcia stabilised zirconia-nickel oxide plates in anode supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The interspacing diminishes towards the surface, where a very fine microstructure is developed.
Titulo: Directionally solidified calcia stabilised zirconia-nickel oxide plates in anode supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Chemical reduction treatment transforms NiO to metallic Ni with the accompanying volume reduction.
Titulo: Directionally solidified calcia stabilised zirconia-nickel oxide plates in anode supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Complete reduction results into a cermet with 43 CaSZ + 33.5 Ni + 23.5 pores (%vol).
Titulo: Directionally solidified calcia stabilised zirconia-nickel oxide plates in anode supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity is mainly electronic and proceeds along NiO lamellae or through percolating Ni particles.
Titulo: Directionally solidified calcia stabilised zirconia-nickel oxide plates in anode supported solid oxide fuel cells
